allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add Lean 4 TODO REST API server with C FFI sockets

Implement a complete TODO list REST API in Lean 4 with CRUD endpoints
\(GET/POST/PUT/DELETE /todos\) using in-memory storage. HTTP server is
built on POSIX sockets via C FFI, with pure Lean HTTP parsing, JSON
serialization, and request routing. Zero external dependencies.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
